strapline: A blog and notebook by the writers of Lex, the investment column of the FT
description:
Lex live allows a chance to see inside the work of a Lex writer and to 
participate in the construction of a Lex note. It will also contain some brief 
observations and thought-provoking questions from Lex columnists.
descriptionXML: Lex live allows a chance to see inside the work of a Lex writer and to participate in the construction of a Lex note. It will also contain some brief observations and thought-provoking questions from Lex columnists.

description:
Richard Waters, Tim Bradshaw, Hannah Kuchler and Leslie Hook in the FT’s San 
Francisco bureau share their views - plus tech insights from Murad Ahmed and 
Chris Nuttall in London.
descriptionXML: Richard Waters, Tim Bradshaw, Hannah Kuchler and Leslie Hook in the FT’s San Francisco bureau share their views - plus tech insights from Murad Ahmed and Chris Nuttall in London.

strapline: A liberal and critical perspective look on legal and policy matters
description:
This blog looks at law and policy, and it also looks at the media 
representation of legal and policy matters. Nothing on this blog constitutes 
legal advice.
descriptionXML: This blog looks at law and policy, and it also looks at the media representation of legal and policy matters. Nothing on this blog constitutes legal advice.
